synopsis.text: Music by Soyoka Hayashi, sound effects by Ayano Kitazono, and produced by Mitsuko Okamoto, this 2015 anime directed by Eri Kinoshita, a first-year student at Tokyo University of the Arts' Graduate School of Film and New Media, presents a heartwarming tale of family dynamics. The story unfolds as a child returns home one day to discover her mother transformed into a cat, leaving her bewildered. Despite the initial confusion, the family adapts to their new reality, and their days together unfold with a tranquil grace, akin to a gentle spring breeze. This charming anime offers a unique perspective on the bonds that unite families and the power of acceptance.
